title: Hailstorm
description: Clemmie Hail awakens to find herself in the middle of a human trafficking ring. The buyers not only want her body, but her blood. Can she escape from a certain deadly fate? Demigods Paxton Summers and his brother were on an impossible quest to find the lost Sword of Freyr. Using their particular set of skills they divert their attention to protect their new found friends from bounty hunters.
author: Relina Skye
